alert.note: Alert for Baker; Decatur; Grady; Miller; Mitchell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 6:44PM EDT until August 11 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Southeastern Miller County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Baker County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 643 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southeast of Colquitt, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, Cairo, Whigham, West Bainbridge, Attapulgus, Climax, Hanover, Ausmac, Babcock, Capel, Recovery, Decatur Co A/P, Harrells Still, Laingkat, Calvary, Boykin, Princes Still, Peoples Still, Amsterdam and Nickleville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
